Question: Kelly's Heroes was the last film in which this person appeared, that was not produced by his own Malpaso Productions.
Hints: Governor Schwarzenegger appointed this person to the California Film Commission in April 2004.
In 1970, this person starred in the western Two Mules for Sister Sara, with Shirley MacLaine and directed by Don Siegel.
The original music score was composed by this person and Lennie Niehaus.
